description:
Next one is in January, or we can organise another one on weekday evenings in English if there is at least 4 people interested...

Trois séances de 3 heures pour apprendre à utiliser la machine à coudre et les techniques de base. Les ateliers se déroulent en trois samedis consécutifs de 10hs à 13hs.
name: Sewing for begginers - FULL !!

description:
Garde ta robe ! Upcycle your wardrobe !

The info is in French, but this workshop can also be given in English or Spanish.

Just contact me ([masked]).

Après la Toussaint ... c’est le moment de donner une touche créative et une seconde vie au contenu de votre garde-robe ! Venez et apprenez à maîtriser quelques techniques de couture pour customiser et transformer vos vêtements fétiche en vue des festivités de fin d’année.

Quand : le 9 et/ou 11 Novembre 2013

Horaire : de 15h à 18h le samedi 9 Novembre. - Adultes et ados à partir de 14 ans

10h à 13h et 14h à 17h le lundi 11 Novembre - Adultes et enfant à partir de 9 ans

Pré-requis : connaitre les fonctions de bases d’une machine à coudre et les techniques de base (surfilage, ourlets, etc)

Matériel : Osez rêver ! tous vos vieux habits, foulards, jupes, draps, chemises,...vous serviront.

Prix : Pour un atelier de 3h - 40€

Pour deux ateliers de 3h - 75€

Pour trois ateliers de 3h - 110€
name: Sew your X-Mas dress by upcycling your wardrobe

description:
10€ - participation fee

Registration required here: http://www.larut.eu/fr/ateliers/article/cafe-couture

Come and sew in a group, exchange ideas and tips with fellow sewaholics. I will bring cake and there will be tea. The sewing machines, scissors, needles, rulers etc are already there you just need to bring your project, fabric, pattern paper and matching threat to get going...
Just beware : this is not a workshop, not techniques or scheduled training is foreseen, only informal exchange and just the pleasure to sew together!
name: Café-couture : let's sew together!

description:
10€ - participation fee

Registration required here: http://www.larut.eu/fr/ateliers/article/cafe-couture

Come and sew in a group, exchange ideas and tips with fellow sewaholics while siping tea. The sewing machines, scissors, needles, rulers etc are already there you just need to bring your project, fabric, pattern paper and matching threat to get going... Just beware : this is not a workshop, not techniques or scheduled training is foreseen, only informal exchange and just the pleasure to sew together!
name: Café-couture : let's sew together !

description:
Come and discover my workshop on the 1st of May. The street in which the workshop is placed will be hosting their annual feast with music, food, antiques, garage sale and all the initiatives hosted there open to the public.
In La Vitrine-transformatek where my workshop is we will be hosting open and free knitting, sewing and upcycle sessions all day long!
I would love to get to know you so we can discuss about future MeetUps around sewing.
name: Open workshop - 1st of May

description:
An open space to come and advance on your sewing projects (for those who already know how to sew). You can register for one hour, two hours, three hours or the whole 6 hours of the two afternoons. Take advantage of the two big working tables, the sewing machines, the support and advide of a professional. Relax, socialise and enjoy a cup of tea while doing your own creations. Sunday 18th May from 15pm to 18pm and Sunday 25th May from 10am to 13pm.
Registration in advance needed here : http://www.larut.eu/fr/ateliers/article/cafe-couture
name: Café-couture / Open workshop - 18th & 25th May

description: An open session, just come, bring your sewing project or ambitions and make use of the space, the sewing machines, the books and tutorials, the professional support... to cover for the expenses (tea, rent, etc) I ask a contribution of 10€/hour per person.
name: Sew @ café-couture this Sunday

description:
REGISTRATION NEEDED TO PARTICIPATE here : http://www.larut.eu/en/workshops/article/module-1-sewing-for-beginners?lang=en
  Learning the basics : 3 workshops of 2.5 hours each in which you will learn how to use a sewing machine and the basic sewing techniques. And you will make your first tote bag!! Price : 120€
name: Sewing for beginners IN ENGLISH !

description:
Learning the basics : 3 workshops of 2,5 hours each in which you will learn how to use a sewing machine, the basic sewing techniques AND you will make your first tote bag!
Registration required in advance here: http://www.larut.eu/en/workshops/article/module-1-sewing-for-beginners
name: Sewing for beginners in August

description:
Please note that registration in advance is always needed.

Never find the time to sew at home? or you don't have the right space for it? Come and fix, adapt, upcycle, customise your favorite clothing or just create new ones for the season to come! Take advantage of a great space adapted to sewing with 6 sewing machines, an overlock machine, big working tables, books, tutorials and professional accompaniment. All Tuesdays starting on 22nd April at la Vitrine-Transformatek in Saint-Gilles. French, Spanish and English spoken.
For information and registration go here : http://www.larut.eu/en/workshops/article/open-workshop
name: Open workshop - every other Saturday afternoon

description:
REGISTRATION REQUIRED TO PARTICIPATE (http://www.larut.eu/en/workshops/article/module-1-sewing-for-beginners)

3 day module (22 and 29 October and 5 November) - Learning the basics : 3 workshops of 2,5 hours each in which you will learn how to use a sewing machine, the basic sewing techniques AND you will make your first tote bag!

Session 1 - How the sewing machine works

Sessions 2 and 3- The zig-zag stitch, overcasting, and the hems. Sewing a tote bag.

The fabric for the workshops is not included in the price but all the other utensils and sewing machines are. Once you are registered you will receive an email with the details for the payment. Payment in advance is required in order to secure your spot. A few days before the workshop you will receive the list of materials to buy for the workshops.
name: Sewing for beginners (in ENG) - Registration needed @ www.larut.eu
